sections.markdown:
##### 1. Open Logs App
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/open-logs-app.webp)

##### 2. Filter for ERROR or WARN Logs
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/logs_app_filter_status.png)

##### 3. Filter for `trace_id != null`
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/logs_app_filter_trace_id.png)

##### 4. Filter for `astroshop` k8s Namespace
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/logs_app_filter_namespace.gif)

##### 5. Click on a log record and explore the log attributes by scrolling down
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/logs_app_view_log_attributes_topology.gif)

##### 6. Click `View Trace` and explore the distributed trace in the Distributed Tracing app, in context of the log record 
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dynatrace-wwse/workshop-dynatrace-log-analytics/refs/heads/main/assets/images/logs_app_view_distributed_trace.gif)
